name: Fruit Market Express
description:
Fill as many harvest boxes you can before 4pm.

  • Click on feet to move around.
  • Click on crates to get fruit (and vegetables).
  • Double-click on fruit to give them to customers. You can also drag them around.
  • Go to the cash register to sell when they're full.

Credits:

  • Ben Kalman: Design, code, audio, music.
  • Andrea Mitchell: Art.
